‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Butyric Acid ‚Äì Not Rancid Sour or Pungent ‚Ä¢ More of a Soft Cheese

\- Smooth and Soft vs Thick, Syrupy Texture of real Condensed Milk

\- Needs support of Thicker/Heavier Dairy & Sweetener for a Richer, Creamy, Syrup-like Texture\* of Real Condensed Milk
